We did estimate for task "Changes in phones".

Some auction houses require id and or tax number from a user that wants to participate in their auctions. These requirement may be different if a user is from the same country as the auction house or is from a foreign country, and if the user is a company (i.e. this company field is not empty). use this api when you need to decide which information to force when you collecting information fo the usersupdateDetails api
Update hosting clients - 1-hour
Code changes and QA - 4 hours Update hosting clients - 1 hour Update plugin client - 1-3 hours

Hi, There are few new developments in high priority that we need: Use country code in the phone number: We started to display the phone number in 2 fields: country code and the phone number. The field mobilePhone is going to be deprecated and instead the fields phoneCountryCode + phone need to be used. In order to get all values for phoneCountryCode - use the settingsgetCountriesList. Everything is described in the updated updated API document. Check the updated demo to see how to display and update the phone field In the next phase we will handle phone verification, currently there is no need. Registration per auction with a credit cards: We added an option to register to an auction with a credit card. I made the settings to auction 10 in the QA. You will see that there are 2 new menus for each auction in the admin: Approval requests and Approved participants. Each approved user is added to the Approved participants of the relevant auction. You can find the information in the API document at sections Approval per auction and Working with payment methods. And you can see in the demo the exact implementation. The development should include: A section for the user managing his Payment methods - add and delete (see the demo) When the approval per auction is enabled for a certain auction - add a button to register for the auction. The button opens a registration popup - you can see the implementation in the demo and how we did it in our QA portal. I suggest we will have a short phone call and go over it. Please let me know when you are available.

We received a message from a Bidpirit Arbel Raz representative that there are problems registering new users in the Google Chrome browser. We will need time to check and find out the reasons.

Мы получили сообщение от представителя Bidpirit Arbel Raz сообщение о том что есть проблемы при регистрации новых пользователей в браузере Google Chrome. Нам потребуется время на проверку и выяснение причин.
Что нового появилось в этом плане?

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your support request and a ticket has been created. A support representative will be reviewing your request and respond to you as soon as possible. You can review the status of the ticket by logging in to your portal account, or visit the ticket URL: https:support.macincloud.comsupportticketspublic436e177e53eb951db87a05b44b5149c477d4ecc8421e3e386a6f97386cebccc1 If you have not already provided us detailed descriptions and screenshots of the issue you may be experiencing, please reply to this email with those details and relevant screenshots. This will allow us to better exam the issue and help you promptly. Please make sure to provide the specific server name and user name of your server account, as well as contacting us from the original account owner email to prevent support delays. Here are a few tips for common issues. They maybe helpful for you: 1. New Apple App Store submission requirement starts April 25 (reference: https:developer.apple.comnews?id=5zb13auf). If you need to use Xcode 13.x, you should select a plan with macOS Monterey (12.x). If you have a plan with an earlier macOS, please back up your files using a cloud service such as Dropbox.com, Backup and Sync by Google, or other service such as Git, and obtain a new plan with macOS Monterey. The pricing is outlined here: https:checkout.macincloud.comselectmanaged . If you need help, simply confirm that you wish to switch to a newer macOS once you have completed your backup, and we will issue you a new macOS Monterey plan replacing your existing plan. 2. If you are using Visual Studio for Mac and encountering errors regarding the new Xamarin.iOS requirement for Xcode 13.x. Please review topic 1 discussed above. You will need to switch to a newer macOS. 3. If you are encountering app signing issues related to WWDR Certificates, please contact us with your server and account name for assistance. 4. If you are facing server connection issues, please make sure to submit your support request with your server name, user name, and detailed descriptions of the specific error(s) you are encountering. This allows us to quickly identify your server and help you. Please also make sure that you are not behind a home or office firewall that blocks your remote access. 5. If you have not received any new account email with your server access credentials after purchasing a plan, please first check your email SPAM folder. You may find your new account email there. To explore other solutions, you may also visit our Knowledge Base by clicking HERE. To add comments to this support request, you may simply reply to this email. To view the status of the ticket or add online, please login to our Support Portal using the same email that you created the ticket with, or visit: https:support.macincloud.comsupportticketspublic436e177e53eb951db87a05b44b5149c477d4ecc8421e3e386a6f97386cebccc1 Thank you for your patience.
